title: Do you know when Shenandoah St (near Creek Ridge Rd) will be repaired? It was damaged during the heavy rain event we had in early October.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/2015/12/when-will-shenandoah-street-near-creek-ridge-road-will-be-repaired-it-was-damaged-during-the-heavy-rain-event-we-had-in-early-october/
